thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Nanning Sugar Industry sees 2017 net loss to be 185 mln yuan to 194 mln yuan

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Nanning Sugar Industry sees 2017 net loss to be 185 mln yuan to 194 mln yuan

organizations.name: reuters) - nanning sugar industry co ltd

text:
Jan 30(Reuters) - Nanning Sugar Industry Co Ltd
* Sees 2017 net loss to be 185 million yuan to 194 million yuan
* Says 2016 net profit was 19 million yuan
* Says that decreased gross margin and sales of main product and increased financial costs as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/fDbA2o
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
